items.name: http-proxy-middleware@2.0.6
items.title: Denial of Service (DoS)
items.description: Allows attackers to overload the server by sending specially crafted requests, potentially causing the application to become unresponsive or crash.
items.resolution: Upgrade to version 2.0.7 or later to resolve this issue.

items.name: body-parser@1.20.2
items.title: Asymmetric Resource Consumption (Amplification)
items.description: Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to amplify resource usage, leading to degraded performance or denial of service.

items.name: micromatch@4.0.7
items.title: Inefficient Regular Expression Complexity
items.description: Complex regular expressions can be exploited to cause excessive backtracking, resulting in high CPU usage and potential DoS.

items.name: nth-check@1.0.2
items.title: ReDoS
items.description: Improperly handled regular expressions can be abused to cause excessive computation, leading to denial of service.

items.name: webpack-dev-server@4.15.2
items.title: Origin Validation Error
items.description: Insufficient validation of request origins can allow attackers to bypass security controls, potentially leading to cross-site attacks.

items.name: cookie@0.6.0
items.title: XSS
items.description: Allows attackers to inject malicious scripts into web pages viewed by other users, potentially stealing data or hijacking sessions.

items.name: express@4.19.2
items.title: XSS
items.description: Improper input sanitization can allow attackers to execute scripts in the context of the user's browser.
items.resolution: Update to version 4.20.0 or later and ensure proper input validation.

items.name: rollup@2.79.1
items.title: XSS
items.description: Vulnerable to cross-site scripting attacks, which can compromise user data and site integrity.

items.name: serialize-javascript@4.0.0
items.title: XSS
items.description: Improper serialization can allow attackers to inject scripts, leading to XSS attacks.

items.name: webpack@5.92.1
items.title: XSS
items.description: Vulnerable to cross-site scripting, which can allow attackers to execute arbitrary scripts in the user's browser.

items.name: @babel/helpers@7.24.7
items.title: ReDoS
items.description: Improperly handled regular expressions can be exploited to cause excessive computation, leading to denial of service.

items.name: @babel/runtime@7.24.7
items.title: ReDoS
items.description: Improperly handled regular expressions can be exploited to cause excessive computation, leading to denial of service.

items.name: path-to-regexp@0.1.7
items.title: ReDoS
items.description: Vulnerable to regular expression denial of service, which can be exploited to slow down or crash the application.

items.name: path-to-regexp@0.1.7
items.title: ReDoS
items.description: Vulnerable to regular expression denial of service, which can be exploited to slow down or crash the application.

items.name: nanoid@3.3.7
items.title: Improper Input Validation
items.description: Improper input validation can allow attackers to inject malicious data, potentially leading to security breaches.

items.name: postcss@7.0.39
items.title: Improper Input Validation
items.description: Improper input validation can allow attackers to inject malicious data, potentially leading to security breaches.

items.name: http-proxy-middleware@2.0.6
items.title: Always-Incorrect Control Flow
items.description: Incorrect control flow implementation can lead to unexpected behavior and potential security risks.

medium.category: Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions

items.name: http-proxy-middleware@2.0.6
items.title: Improper Check
items.description: Improper checks for exceptional conditions can allow attackers to exploit edge cases, potentially leading to security issues.

items.name: webpack-dev-server@4.15.2
items.title: Exposed Dangerous Method
items.description: Exposing dangerous methods or functions can allow attackers to perform unauthorized actions.

medium.category: Missing Release of Resource after Effective Lifetime

items.name: inflight@1.0.6
items.title: Missing Release of Resource
items.description: Failure to release resources after use can lead to resource leaks and degraded performance.
items.resolution: No fix available. Consider replacing the dependency if possible.

items.name: brace-expansion@2.0.1
items.title: ReDoS
items.description: Improperly handled regular expressions can be exploited to cause excessive computation, leading to denial of service.

items.title: XSS
items.description: Allows attackers to inject malicious scripts into web pages viewed by other users, potentially stealing data or hijacking sessions.
